user_input: A 70-year-old male with a 40 pack-year smoking history presents with chronic productive cough
ground_truth_output: progressive dyspnea, and recurrent respiratory infections. Spirometry shows FEV1/FVC < 0.7.,Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease

user_input: A 30-year-old female presents with episodic palpitations
ground_truth_output: tremors, weight loss despite increased appetite, heat intolerance, and anxiety. Examination reveals tachycardia, fine tremor, and exophthalmos.,Graves' disease
